name: Lemony Zucchini Slaw
description: This salad of julienned zucchini is dressed in yogurt and tossed with a generous amount of lemon juice and zest. Use as many bright herbs as possible, or a single herb if you prefer, and chop them at the last minute.
recipeCategory: dinner, lunch, quick, salads and dressings, vegetables
keywords: appetizer, side dish, chervil, feta, lemon, mint, sorrel, yogurt, zucchini, gluten-free, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds small zucchini or summer squash, preferably a mix of colors
4 ounces feta cheese, crumbled, for garnish
3 tablespoons pine nuts, lightly toasted, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Top and tail the zucchini. Julienne with a large knife, mandoline, food processor or spiralizer.
Transfer zucchini to a large bowl. Season generously with salt and pepper. Add lemon zest and juice and toss well. Set aside for 10 minutes.
Add yogurt and toss to coat well. Taste and adjust seasoning. Add chopped herbs and mix gently. Garnish with feta and pine nuts to serve.
